content: Updated microblog and latest status widget
items.summary:
Lots of new updates this time around!

Major updates:

  • Added a brand new [shrine](/shrines/gilgamesh) dedicated to one of my favorite Final Fantasy characters!
  • New button! There are also buttons available in 32x32 and 200x40.
  • My RSS feed now looks super fancy, making it easier to read without a feed reader. It looks a little weird in Firefox, but that's a problem for another day lol
  • Microblog and "Latest Status" widget have now been placed by StatusCafe to allow myself to make quick status updates without misleading others into thinking I made a huge update on the site. XD;;
  • Added a button that allows users to scroll to the top of the page. Yes, it is pure CSS. :3
  • Added a [pixel club](/goodies/pixel_clubs) and some [links](/links)!

Minor updates:

  • Changed the RSS feed icon to its original orange
  • Updated the example code in Status Cafe feed reader tutorial to be a bit more robust
  • Moved fanlistings and webrings into one page called "Joined"

Hi there! I decided to bring back the [/now](/now) page.

There is also an [accessibility statement](/accessibility)! I really want to make it clear that I'm trying to make my website as accessible as possible! It won't be perfect, but at least my site works on mobile!
content: Other minor updates to site. If you don't notice them, that's a good thing!
